analysis.key_quote: I oppose politicizing the federal workforce by stripping civil service protections from many thousands of dedicated public servants, as proposed in the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) Docket ID: OPM-2025-0004, "Improving Performance, Accountability and Responsiveness in the Civil Service."
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization, the erosion of civil service protections, and violations of due process rights, which align with the themes of merit-based systems and employee rights.
